On the other hand, "Black Swan" is an American drama film directed by Thomasinka Novak in 2010. The film was inspired by the 1968 ballet "Swan Lake" choreographed by Rudolf Nureyev and also based on some real events. In this film, we can see how a dancer becomes obsessed with perfection and how it affects her relationships, performance, and even her life.
